title: Elsa Pataky, 43, announces her first ever Australian book
text:
She's the mother-of-three renowned for her jaw-dropping physique.

And 43-year Elsa Pataky is now sharing her wealth of fitness knowledge with fans - as she's announced her very first Australian book, titled: 'Strong'.

Chris Hemsworth's wife took to Instagram to confirm the incredible news, after working on the book for 'over a year'.

'I'm really excited!' Elsa Pataky (pictured) confirmed she's releasing her first ever Australia book on 'how to live a balanced and healthy life'

'I’m really excited to announce that I will be launching my first Australian book on November 26th!,' she wrote.

The blonde beauty - who previously released a Spanish fitness book called Intensidad Max in 2014 - confirmed her new work would be a blend of advice, fitness training and food recipes.

She continued: 'This is your guidebook on how to live to a balanced and healthy life. My approach is about building strength of body and mind.

Beach babe: Elsa - who has previously released a fitness book called Intensidad Max in 2014 -says she wants to help her readers build 'body and mind'

'I share my advice for overcoming mind-traps and other challenges, as well as my favourite high-intensity exercise circuits that can be done from home.

'You'll also find nutrition advice and delicious, healthy recipes.'

Fitness fanatic Elsa shares three children with her Thor actor husband; India, seven, and identical twins Tristan and Sasha, five.

Body secrets: Elsa Pataky has confirmed she'll reveal all on how she maintains her sensational physique - from diet, to workouts. Pictured here with husband Chris Hemsworth in 2017

The Spanish model is known for her flawless bikini body and in November, revealed to OK! Magazine about how she keeps in shape and her favourite healthy juice recipe.

'An apple, a carrot, some celery with the green leaves, a lemon without the peel,' she began, listing the ingredients.

She continued with the recipe: 'Once it's done, you add a few teaspoons of olive oil. Super good.'
